title: Crazy Sexy Kitchen (2012).epub Gooner
description:
Crazy Sexy Kitchen - 150 Plant-Empowered Recipes to Ignite a Mouthwatering Revolution (2012).epub Gooner

Publisher: Hay House; 1st edition (October 30, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1401941044
ISBN-13: 978-1401941048

The woman who made prevention hot is now making it delicious! Crazy Sexy Kitchen, the follow-up to Kris Carrâ€™s New York Times bestseller Crazy Sexy Diet, is a
Veggie Manifesto for plant-empowered gourmands and novices alike, and itâ€™s filled with inspiration, education, cooking tips, and over 150 nourishing, nosh-worthy recipes. Infused with her signature humor, style, and personal stories, Crazy Sexy Kitchen redefines the kitchen as headquarters for Americaâ€™s wellness revolution. The goodness born in the Crazy Sexy Kitchen will reach deep into the rest of your lifeâ€”enriching your health, your home, your heart, and the planet.
 
Crazy Sexy Kitchen gives readers all the tools and know-how needed to adopt a joyful and vibrant Crazy Sexy Diet and Lifestyle. What is the Crazy Sexy Diet and Lifestyle, you ask? A nutrient-dense, plant-happy approach to eating and living that harmonizes your beautiful body at the cellular level. Itâ€™s a celebratory way of life thatâ€™s deeply connected, healthy, awake and engaged. Now thatâ€™s SEXY!
 
Like a long, luxurious meal, Crazy Sexy Kitchen is laid out in courses. Youâ€™ll start with a detailed review of the Crazy Sexy Diet. Next youâ€™ll learn how to stock your culinary arsenal. Kris will show you how to find the best kitchen tools and equipment, and prep you with basic culinary skills and lingo. Handy symbols like, gluten-free, soy-free, kid-friendlyâ€”and for the time pressedâ€”Crazy Sexy Quickies, help you to easily identify the recipes that are perfect for your dietary needs. Not sure how to put a whole meal together? No problem. Crazy Sexy Kitchen covers that, tooâ€”with a hearty dose of menu plans and recipes to inspire and delight.
 
Joined by Whole Foods chef, Chad Sarno, Crazy Sexy Kitchen offers over 150 delicious, nutrient-dense recipes designed to nourish the mind, body, and soul. From juicing to planning a three-course meal, Crazy Sexy Kitchen has all the essentials to fill your kitchen (and life!) with health, happiness, family, friends, and good times
